ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on sunshades and sandals
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:0.5_0: 86. The training rule on ornamentations of the hip
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.2_0: there was a nun was associating with the family of a certain woman.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.3_0: That woman said to that nun,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.4_0: “Venerable, please give this hip ornament to such-and-such a woman.”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.6_0: “If I carry it in my almsbowl, I’ll get into trouble,” and so she put it on and then left.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.7_0: While she was walking along a street the threads snapped and were scattered all over.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.8_0: People then complained and criticized those nuns,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.9_0: “How can nuns wear hip ornaments? They are just like householders who indulge in worldly pleasures!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.10_0: Nuns heard the complaints of those people,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.11_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.12_0: “How could a nun wear a hip ornament?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.13_0: “Is it true, monks, that a nun did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.16_0: “... How can a nun do this?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.17_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.18_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:1.19.1_0: ‘If a nun wears a hip ornament, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:2.1.8_0: if she uses it even once, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:2.2.2_0: if she wears it because she is ill;
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:2.2.5_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc86:2.2.6_0: The third rule, the third training rule on fire, is finished.
